00032 class XVImageScalar : public XVImageBase<T> {

00061     operator XVImageScalar<T2>()   const {   
00062     
00063     XVImageScalar<T2> newScalar;
00064     ScalartoScalar(*this, newScalar);
00065     return newScalar;
00066   }
